text.div:
PathologyTestResultStatusValues

Set of values for the pathology test result status.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/pathology-test-result-status-va defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
1 RegisteredNo result yet available.
2 InterimThis is an initial or interim result: data may be missing or verification has not been performed.
3 FinalThe result is complete and verified by the responsible pathologist.
4 AmendedThe result has been modified subsequent to being Final, and is complete and verified by the responsible pathologist.
5 Cancelled/AbortedThe result is unavailable because the test was not started or not completed.

name: PathologyTestResultStatusValues
description: Set of values for the pathology test result status.

concept.definition: This is an initial or interim result: data may be missing or verification has not been performed.
The result is complete and verified by the responsible pathologist.
The result has been modified subsequent to being Final, and is complete and verified by the responsible pathologist.
The result is unavailable because the test was not started or not completed.
